name: Encore Parkour
description:
This is a 3D RAGE Parkour Game. Here you can play with wall run and you can grapple the thing. The most interesting thing is that there is a speed Run mode. Hope you Like it. It has three levels Easy , Hard and SpeedRun. and the controls are very simple ( WASD ctrl). And you can also make YouTube video because the song is non-copyright. 

- IF YOU CAN DONATE PLEASE DONATE -

SIMPLE CONTROLS : -
